text: The 2006 Danish National Badminton Championships were held in Vejen, from February 3 to February 5, 2006. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="margin:auto" !Category !Winners !Runners-up !Score |- |Men's singles |Peter Gade |Kenneth Jonassen |8–3 (retired) |- |Women's singles |Tine Rasmussen |Anne Marie Pedersen |11–0, 11–4 |- |Men's doubles |Jens Eriksen & Martin Lundgaard Hansen |Mathias Boe & Carsten Mogensen |15–7, 15–13 |- |Women's doubles |Mette Schjoldager & Britta Andersen |Kamilla Rytter Juhl & Lena Frier Kristiansen |15–8, 15–3 |- |Mixed doubles |Jens Eriksen & Mette Schjoldager |Thomas Laybourn & Kamilla Rytter Juhl |15–7, 11–15, 15–13 |} ==References== ==External links== *Complete draws Category:Danish National Badminton Championships Danish National Badminton Championships, 2006 Danish National Badminton Championships
title: 2006 Danish National Badminton Championships
